data.title: Movies starring Rachel Mcadams
data.meta_description: On Reelviews you can find extended reviews and ratings for movies starring 'Rachel Mcadams', including thoughts on the world of cinematography by James Berardinelli.
data.text:

Doctor Strange

Family Stone, The

It's a tough thing for a dysfunctional-family-at-Christmas movie to avoid doses of melodrama, and it's fair to say that The Family Stone contains its share. But the nice thing about the movie is that it avoids overt manipulation. There's some - i...

Game Night

Hot Chick, The
